item.title: Newmont Cost-Cutting Helps Boost Earnings as Gold Prices Rally
item.description: Newmont Corp. has made progress getting its costs under control, helping the world’s top gold miner beat expectations on earnings at a time when a rally for the precious metal is underpinning the indu
